sentence: Even if he clinched the nomination, he’d still have to face off against the state’s lieutenant governor John Fetterman, who’s both very popular and much more social media savvy.
author: Matt Prigge
title: Dr. Oz Is Big Mad That He Was Asked To Quit His Presidential Council Post (Ditto Herschel Walker)

sentence: On the Democratic side, Pennsylvania's progressive lieutenant governor, John Fetterman, is locked in a race against Congressman Conor Lamb, a moderate representing the northwestern suburbs of Pittsburgh.
title: Trump delivers prized endorsement to 'brilliant' Dr Oz in Pennsylvania Senate race - even though the TV surgeon once told the former president to lose weight

sentence: Kellyanne: No, I’m not afraid pic.twitter.com/efVgWLuTFi — Acyn (@Acyn) April 13, 2022 One way he might pay, I suppose, is if his endorsement of Oz pushes him over the top in the GOP primary, only to have Oz fumble away the general election to hulking progressive John Fetterman.
author: Allahpundit
title: Laura Ingraham: I'm not afraid to say that Trump endorsing Dr. Oz was a mistake
